titleStmt.title: Ptōchopharmakon, seu Medicamen miseris, or Pauperum pyxidicula salutifera. Help for the poor collected for the benefit of such as are not able to make use of physitians and chiurgians, or live remote from them. Also an appendix concerning letting blood in the smallpox. By Robert Pemel, physitian of Crane-brook in Kent.
titleStmt.author: Pemell, Robert.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.L. for Philemon Stephens, at the Gilden-Lion, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: The first word of title is in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
